/**
    * @description      : 
    * @author           : MLab
    * @group            : 
    * @created          : 07/10/2021 - 10:05:53
    * 
    * MODIFICATION LOG
    * - Version         : 1.0.0
    * - Date            : 07/10/2021

    * - Modification    : 
**/
/**
    * @description      : 
    * @author           : MLab
    * @group            : 
    * @created          : 05/10/2021 - 14:22:53
    * 
    * MODIFICATION LOG
    * - Version         : 1.0.0
    * - Date            : 05/10/2021
    * - Author          : MLab
    * - Modification    : 
**/
import React from 'react';
import { Text, View, StyleSheet, TextInput, SafeAreaView, ScrollView, Image} from 'react-native';

import { Card } from 'react-native-paper';

import { AntDesign } from '@expo/vector-icons';
import Stroke from '../images/strokeImg.png';
import strVid from '../images/stroke-vid.jpg';

export default function Home() {


  return (
    <View > 

      <View style= {styles.header}>
        <Text style= {{ fontSize: 36}}>What's your EMERGENCY?</Text>
      </View>


      <Card style={styles.txtCards}>

          <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row'}}> 
        
            <AntDesign name="search1" size={18} color="black"  style= {{marginTop:15, marginLeft: 8}}/>
        
            <TextInput style={styles.txtSearch} 
              name= 'search' placeholder= 'Search' 
            />

          </View>

        </Card>

      <Card style= {styles.menu}>
          
        <ScrollView horizontal={true}>
          <View> 
            <Image style={styles.strokeMenu} source= {Stroke} />
          </View>

          <View> 
            <Image style={styles.conImg} source= {Stroke} />
          </View>

          <View> 
            <Image style={styles.conImg} source= {Stroke} />
          </View>

          <View> 
            <Image style={styles.conImg} source= {Stroke} />
          </View>
          
          <View> 
            <Image style={styles.conImg} source= {Stroke} />
          </View>
          <View> 
            <Image style={styles.conImg} source= {Stroke} />
          </View>
          <View> 
            <Image style={styles.conImg} source= {Stroke} />
          </View>
          <View> 
            <Image style={styles.conImg} source= {Stroke} />
          </View>
          <View> 
            <Image style={styles.conImg} source= {Stroke} />
          </View>
        </ScrollView>   

      </Card>

      <Card style= {styles.menu}>
      <ScrollView horizontal={true}>

      </ScrollView>
      </Card>


      <View>
        <Image style={styles.strokeVid} source= {strVid} />
      </View>


    </View>
  )
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({

  header: {
    paddingLeft: 30,
    paddingTop: 50
  },

  menu: {
      width: 316, 
      marginLeft: 30,
      marginTop: 20, 
      borderRadius: 15, 
      backgroundColor: '#f7eeee',
    },

  strokeMenu: {
    height:55, 
    width: 55, 
    borderRadius: 15,
    borderWidth: 15,
    borderColor: '#F96056',
  },

  conImg: {
    height:55, 
    width: 55, 
    borderRadius: 15,
    borderWidth: 15,
    borderColor: '#F96056',
    marginLeft: 32
  },

  txtSearch: {
    width: 320,
    height: 50,
    borderRadius: 10,
    outline: 'none',
    backgroundColor: 'lightgrey', 
    paddingLeft: 10,
  },

  txtCards: {
    backgroundColor: 'lightgrey', 
    width: 320,
    height: 50, 
    borderRadius: 10,
    marginLeft: 28,
    marginTop: 25
  },

  strokeVid: {
    height:205, 
    width: 315,
    borderRadius: 30,
    marginLeft: 30,
    marginTop: 50
}
  
});
